display_long_description:
Ape Ascent is a fun game,
It lets you play Horror or only up!
In Horror you get to be chased by Monsters through Long Narrow Metal Corridors.
In Only up you get to jump from prop to prop, hoping you dont fall off. But when you reach the top, you get to jump off!
Also its Multiplayer! You get to play with 9 others! Sounds fun. I think.

Ape Ascent is a VR Climbing game with Horror in it. Its like an Only Up VR where the goal is to get to the top. But if you get bored, theres always Horror and a new Floor Is Lava Game Mode!
Very Fun!
If you like VR Horror, Only Up VR or Floor is Lava in VR get this amazing game!

This game is Early Access. Features will be added or removed as time goes on. Why not join the fun now? I think you should get the game. Please. This was Developed by 1 guy by the way. please don't judge.
